Class BookingService

java.lang.Object
com.yash.MovieBooking.service.BookingService
@Service public class BookingService extends Object
Service class for managing booking-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getSeats

      public List<Seat> getSeats(int showtimeId)
      Retrieves a list of seats for a given showtime ID.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - The ID of the showtime for which to retrieve seats.
      Returns:
      A list of Seat objects associated with the given showtime ID, or an empty list if no seats are found.

    • saveBookings

      @Transactional public Booking saveBookings(Booking booking)
      Saves a booking to the database and updates the status of the selected seats to "booked".
      Parameters:
      booking - The Booking object to save.
      Returns:
      The saved Booking object.

    • getBookingbyuserId

      @Transactional public List<Booking> getBookingbyuserId(int userId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings for a specific user ID. Ensures that the associated
      invalid @link 
      {@link Booking#//selectedSeatIds
      } collection is loaded within the transaction context.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects associated with the given user ID.

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking(int bookingId)
      Deletes a booking by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to delete.

    • getTotalBookingsAndPrice

      public Map<String,Object> getTotalBookingsAndPrice()
      Calculates the total number of bookings and the total price of all bookings.
      Returns:
      A map containing the total number of bookings and the total price.
